I truly wonder how Dave Chappelle would feel if a white comedian did an hour of racial jokes and then followed it up at the end with "don't worry guys, there was a black guy at one of my shows and BOY was he laughing!"

@anthoknees Agreed. This is so wild irresponsible. If your tiny little off-leash dog runs up to mine without being introduced, my dog will literally snap it in half. I've had to cross the street repeatedly for people with tiny unleashed dogs who saw me & my dog coming and did nothing.

@lsherman @visually Thanks for letting me be a part of something so new & great!
@DearMissNatalie You're doing something similar to ThisAmericanInfographic about RadioLab? I'd love to hear about it! (I <3 RadioLab)
Bible study with Danielle and Dan was interesting and informative. I like learning!
Dear Internet, talk to me about New York City.
Sometimes I write emails as God, too.
Home from the gym. Hands... feel weird. Stomach... feels weird.
I wanna go to the gym as much as I wanna be punched in the face over and over and over.
It's beautiful out tonight.
Just had an awesome little drum session, pumped me up musically for sure.
Eating the chicken / penne alfredo I made last night and tupperware'd. Gonna last me a day or two methinks. And I have more left to cook! =D
Cleaning my room so I have somewhere to sleep and keep my clothes... Great.
Waking up, damn I slept late...
Drawing and then going to sleep. Computer arts inspires me. I got perfume sprayed on me at the mall and it smells horrible, despite showers.
Just left the mall, had a good time with Megan and Jullia. I'm fucking tired though.
